# [Interview #66: Compuserve Chat, Entry #44](https://www.theoryland.com/intvmain.php?i=66#44)

#### Bill Powers

I know you've said we have enough information to figure it out for ourselves, but, are you ever going to come right out and say who (or what) killed Asmodean?

#### Robert Jordan

Read and find out! (sound of villainous laughter in the backgroundâ€”the Phantom of the Opera lives)
